tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces
Interface IConstants

public interface IConstants

The IConstants interface contains all the constants for ad serving and rendering

 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, or keep the original ad if there is no companion ad.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot with a standAlone ad only when no temporal ad will be delivered, if there is any temporal ad selected, let this slot empty, but if there is companion, can use this companion to initial this slot.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, but never deliver a standAlone ad if there is no companion ad.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, or display a new stand alone ad .
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, or display a new stand alone ad if there is no companion ad.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL()
          Keep the original ad in the nontemporal slot.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot with a standAlone ad only when no temporal ad will be delivered, if there is any temporal ad selected, let this slot empty.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE()
          Ask ad server to fill this slot only with the PREROLL slot's companion ad if there is one.
 int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE()
          Display a new ad in the nontemporal slot.
 int SLOT_TYPE_SITESECTION_NONTEMPORAL()
          Type of slot: non-temporal slot in site section.

Player expects multiple creative renditions for an ad.

This is on by default.

PARAMETER_CLICK_VIEW_WIDTH

java.lang.String PARAMETER_CLICK_VIEW_WIDTH()
Specify the Display ad Tap Area width.
Value can be a int to specify the width in pixel of String "xx%" to specify the width in percentage.

PARAMETER_CLICK_VIEW_HEIGHT

java.lang.String PARAMETER_CLICK_VIEW_HEIGHT()
Specify the Display ad Tap Area height.
Value can be a int to specify the width in pixel of String "xx%" to specify the height in percentage.

PARAMETER_DISPLAY_AD_HTML_CONTENT_CLICK_PROCESSING

java.lang.String PARAMETER_DISPLAY_AD_HTML_CONTENT_CLICK_PROCESSING()
Specify whether enable the Display ad HTML content click processing.
Value can be string "true", "false". Default is "false".

PARAMETER_CLICK_DETECTION

java.lang.String PARAMETER_CLICK_DETECTION()
Specify whether renderer should handle user tapping on a temporal ad.
Value can be string "true", "false". Default is "true".
Note: Note: if the value is set to "false", app should handle the ad click by itself.
For example, opening the click through url in a browser.

The dictionary key value for retrieving overridden url to open on ad click event.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE()
Display a new ad in the nontemporal slot.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL()
Keep the original ad in the nontemporal slot.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY()
Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, or keep the original ad if there is no companion ad.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE()
Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, or display a new stand alone ad .

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE()
Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, or display a new stand alone ad if there is no companion ad.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE()
Ask ad server to fill this slot with the first companion ad, but never deliver a standAlone ad if there is no companion ad.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE()
Ask ad server to fill this slot only with the PREROLL slot's companion ad if there is one.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL()
Ask ad server to fill this slot with a standAlone ad only when no temporal ad will be delivered, if there is any temporal ad selected, let this slot empty.

SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL

int SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL()
Ask ad server to fill this slot with a standAlone ad only when no temporal ad will be delivered, if there is any temporal ad selected, let this slot empty, but if there is companion, can use this companion to initial this slot.

PARAMETER_POSTAL_CODE

java.lang.String PARAMETER_POSTAL_CODE()
Specify the postal code of the user for targeting passthrough to 3rd party component.

PARAMETER_AREA_CODE

java.lang.String PARAMETER_AREA_CODE()
Specify the area code of the user's phone for targeting passthrough to 3rd party component.

java.lang.String PARAMETER_KEYWORDS()
Specify a list of keywords for targeting passthrough to 3rd party component.

PARAMETER_SEARCH_STRING

java.lang.String PARAMETER_SEARCH_STRING()
Specify the area code of the user's phone for targeting passthrough to 3rd party component.

PARAMETER_MARITAL

PARAMETER_INCOME

RENDERER_LOAD_TIMEOUT_VALUE

java.lang.String RENDERER_LOAD_TIMEOUT_VALUE()
Should be a string value which can convert to a int to indicate the milliseconds of renderer load timeout value.

PARAMETER_ANDROID_ID

java.lang.String PARAMETER_ANDROID_ID()
Whether to enable automatic retrieval and sending of Android ID when the id is available.
